comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when click on "OK" in "publish template" page.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a template and publish it.
2. Click on "OK" in "publish to template folder" page.
3. NullPointeException is thrown out.
java.lang.NullPointerException
